mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.create_time, c.star_num, c.video_id, u.user_id, u.uuid, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.sex, (select IF(count(1) > 0,1,0) from huomai_user_love where business_id = c.comment_id and type = 2 and user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as love_flag FROM huomai_video_comment c LEFT JOIN huomai_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.video_id = #{bo.videoId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
